Name: Corner Gas Animated
Title: Oedipus Hex
Desc: Ike's barn burns down and Lacey wants to help; Lacey organizes a bachelor auction to raise money.
LongDescription: Ike's barn burns down and Lacey wants to help; Lacey organizes a bachelor auction to raise money, attracting a mystery woman who bids high for Brent; the more time the two spend together, the more curious the town gets about the woman's identity.
